remarks: Conjugate of an inner product in a pre-Hilbert space.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2015.)
statement:
phlsrng.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
phllmhm.h $e |- ., = ( .i ` W ) $.
phllmhm.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
ipcj.i $e |- .* = ( *r ` F ) $.
ipcj $p |- ( ( W e. PreHil /\ A e. V /\ B e. V ) -> ( .* ` ( A ., B ) ) = ( B ., A ) ) $.
